Table1.News title: New plan will support a safe return to in-person learning
Table1.News content: Californiaâ€™s Safe Schools for All Plan will use the latest science to minimize in-school transmissions and support a phased return to in-person instruction.

Table1.News title: Free COVID-19 vaccinations coming to long-term care facilities
Table1.News content: Residents and staff in nursing homes and long-term care settings in California will receive the Pfizer vaccine at no cost through a federal partnership administered by Walgreens and CVS.

To preserve our health care system, the Regional Stay Home Order goes into effect if intensive care unit (ICU) capacity drops below 15% in a region. Counties in the region will be subject to new restrictions.
